character.noteList: Human Features: • One extra skill proficiency of your choosing • One bonus feat of your choosing Noble Feature: • You can secure an audience with a local noble Class Features: • Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests) • Fighting Style - Archery: +2 to attack with ranged weapons • Dual Wielder: You can draw/stow two weapons per round, you can dual wield non-light weapons, and you gain +1 AC while dual wielding • Gain advantage on survival and Int checks concerning your chosen creature type, and you know a language spoken by those creatures • Gain advantage on Wis and Int checks concerning your chosen terrain, and bonuses while traveling through that terrain (see rules) • Take an extra action once between rests • Fighter Archetype: Champion • Crit on 19 • You can sacrifice a spell slot as an action to determine if certain creature types are within 1 mile (6 miles if favored terrain) (see rules) • Big Game Hunter - You can use a reaction to attack a creature of at least Large size that attacks you ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of gaming set ⊠Common Extra Language One Extra Language ⊠martial weapon shield light crossbow + 20 bolts OR two hand axes dungeoneer's pack OR explorer's pack set of fine clothes signet ring scroll of pedigree purse chain mail ⊠⊠Fighter 4, Ranger 3⊠Human⊠Noble⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Baron Crispian Dale⊠Fighter 4, Ranger 3⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠25⊠0⊠0
